backend/main.mo: Motoko backend handling user profiles, game configuration, farm data storage, and admin-gated updates with access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files across gameplay, UI, and config systems.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling with color variables, dark mode rules, and base element styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading the main entry script.
frontend/PLAY_STORE.md: Guide for packaging the web-based game into an Android WebView wrapper for Play Store publishing.
frontend/src/admin/AdminConfigPanel.tsx: Admin-only panel for viewing and updating game configuration values with form inputs and save actions.
frontend/src/admin/useAdminStatus.ts: Hook to determine whether the current user is authenticated and has admin permissions.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component controlling the game state flow and loading game configuration on startup.
frontend/src/game/assets/textures.ts: Exports paths for all generated texture assets used in the 3D scene.
frontend/src/game/config/applyConfig.ts: Converts backend GameConfig into simplified runtime parameters for gameplay and scene behavior.
frontend/src/game/config/defaults.ts: Defines default game configuration values used as a fallback when backend data is unavailable.
frontend/src/game/config/useGameConfig.t: Hook that loads game config from backend with fallback defaults for safe initialization.
frontend/src/game/gameplay/activities/Ha: Tracks harvesting actions on field plots, updating progress and score when the action button is used on new cells.
frontend/src/game/gameplay/activities/Pl: Detects visited field rows as the tractor moves and increments completion and score for each new cell plowed.
frontend/src/game/gameplay/activities/So: Handles sowing interactions triggered by action presses, marking new plots and updating completion and score.
frontend/src/game/gameplay/activities/ty: Defines activity data structures, callbacks, and a helper that builds activity definitions from game config.
frontend/src/game/gameplay/ActivityManag: Coordinates plowing, sowing, and harvesting activities, tracking progress, score, and timing while updating based on tractor position and controls.
frontend/src/game/input/OnScreenControls: Implements mobile on‑screen throttle, steering, and action controls, exposing current state globally.
frontend/src/game/input/types.ts: Defines the ControlState interface for throttle, steering, and action inputs.
frontend/src/game/input/useCombinedContr: Merges keyboard and on‑screen control inputs into a single ControlState.
frontend/src/game/input/useKeyboardContr: Maps keyboard input to throttle, steering, and action states using key listeners.
frontend/src/game/screens/GameOverScreen: Displays final score, reason for game over, and buttons to restart or return to menu.
frontend/src/game/screens/GameScreen.tsx: Initializes and runs the game loop, rendering the 3D scene, HUD, controls, and coordinating with ActivityManager.
frontend/src/game/screens/StartScreen.ts: Shows the main menu with authentication, profile setup, and a button to start the game.
frontend/src/game/three/FarmScene.tsx: Renders the 3D farm environment, updates tractor position via activity manager, and includes lighting, terrain, props, and the tractor rig.
frontend/src/game/three/TractorRig.tsx: Implements tractor physics, movement, and model rendering, exposing position via an imperative handle.
frontend/src/game/ui/HUD.tsx: Displays objective, progress, score, timer, and control hints with color themes based on the current activity.
frontend/src/game/ui/layout.ts: Defines layout constants for HUD scaling, control sizes, safe-area padding, and breakpoints.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication state and helpers using Internet Identity, managing login, stored identity, and context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls for configs, profiles, admin checks, and persistent farm data using React Query.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind setup with theming variables, dark mode settings, layout resets, and mobile optimizations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, QueryClientProvider, and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current state and planned game features for a 3D tractor farming game with content-driven updates and admin tooling.
